thread.title: Le Relais Madeleine, a Perfect Way to Meet Paris
thread.title_full: Le Relais Madeleine, a Perfect Way to Meet Paris - Review of Le Relais Madeleine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: dmitrys823
title: Le Relais Madeleine, a Perfect Way to Meet Paris
text: This hotel is wonderfully located in the heart of Paris, just 5 minutes walk from Rue Royal and some 8 to 10 minutes from the Place de la Concorde. It is really charming in a very particular way: quiet, lodged between residential buildings, it puts you in the middle of Paris daily life.
